subject: Basketball
Wages and Salaries
lead_paragraph: Taurasi’s decision to sit out the 2015 W.N.B.A. season for more pay from her Russian team says much about the state of the pro women’s game in the United States.
snippet: Taurasi’s decision to sit out the 2015 W.N.B.A. season for more pay from her Russian team says much about the state of the pro women’s game in the United States.
